items.sentence: She owes him a lot of money, but she probably won\'t be able to pay it back.
There were blood stains on the shirt that the police found under Tom\'s bed.
Mary took a little mirror out of her purse and checked her hair and make-up.
I was disappointed to see that my bonus was a bit less than I was expecting.
If I had known about your illness, I could have visited you in the hospital.
